level.heading: Applicability.
level.text: This subchapter shall apply, 120 days after the promulgation of the final regulations pursuant to ยง 31-3254, to health insurers, as defined in ยง 31-3251(5), and any agency, organization, facility, or distinct part thereof, licensed pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 44.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 14-96
level.text: For D.C. Law 14-96, see notes following ยง 31-3251.
